title: Rain ruins match after Sangakkara fifty
content: Match Abandoned 32.5 overs Sri Lanka 146 for 3 (Sangakkara 73*, Samaraweera 34*) v Australia Torrential downpour forced the game to be abandoned after Kumar Sangakkara pushed Sri Lanka to 146 for 3 in 32.5 overs. It was a typical tough scramble of a contest that is expected on a turning track in Sri Lanka….
